entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 5:11 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: NNE 34 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle changing to ice pellets or snow overnight. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to freezing rain in the morning then to rain showers near noon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Fog patches developing in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
